players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "I find it strange that we've already lost a town member so early in the game. Let's stay vigilant and work together to identify who among us might be working against our interests."
You: "I agree with Diana. Let's focus on building trust and working together as a team to uncover any hidden agendas. We can't afford to lose any more members."
Charlie: "I support Diana's suggestion to stay vigilant and work together. Let's focus on building trust and uncovering any hidden agendas. We must all be committed to the town's success."
Charlie: "I believe we should all focus on building trust and working together as a team. Let's be open and honest with each other to ensure the safety and success of our town."
Diana: remained silent.
You: remained silent.
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Bob knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "I find it strange that we've already lost a town member so early in the game. Let's stay vigilant and work together to identify who among us might be working against our interests."
Bob: "I agree with Diana. Let's focus on building trust and working together as a team to uncover any hidden agendas. We can't afford to lose any more members."
You: "I support Diana's suggestion to stay vigilant and work together. Let's focus on building trust and uncovering any hidden agendas. We must all be committed to the town's success."
You: "I believe we should all focus on building trust and working together as a team. Let's be open and honest with each other to ensure the safety and success of our town."
Diana: remained silent.
Bob: remained silent.

Charlie: "I believe we should all focus on building trust and working together as a team. Let's be open and honest with each other to ensure the safety and success of our town."
